Test.Description:
The test checks that: - while locking any lock a thread flushes all local values for variables and further loads them anew when needed (in more detail, it is checked that externally modified field is seen to a thread with a new value after acquiring a lock) - while unlocking any lock a thread writes into main memory all values assigned by it to variables (in more detail, it is checked that the modified field as seen by another thread has a new value after unlocking a lock by the current thread)
Covered assertions assert_thread101 assert_thread100
